column4: hi i am new to ubuntu and i am doing the update using synaptic
W: GPG error: http://archive.ubuntu.com hoary Release: The following signatures were invalid: BADSIG 40976EAF437D05B5 Ubuntu Archive Automatic Signing Key <ftpmaster@ubuntu.com>
if that is wrong, that error will come up
it might be other things, but that is probably the most likely
windows might be messing with your time
this may not be the issue, but whenever I ran into it it was due to time
i tried to sync my time with ntp but it asked me to install it
there is a wierd bug associated with that
is there a way to get around that bug
I think may just be a reporting bug. I suspect that it has enabled NTP, it just needs a reboot to tell it that
it plays with the system clock
